@TitusPollo,

I don't upload in MP3 unless requested.... sorry!  HD space is cheap and FLAC sounds infinitely better.

There are a ton of file converting programs out there if you want MP3.  I use Switch Sound.  You can download it here at TPB.

http://thepiratebay.org/search/switch%20sound%20file%20converter/0/7/0
